show-student works!

  • {{ s.name }}
  • {{ s.email }}
  • {{ s.gender }}
Add Student import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Student } from '../Models/Student'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-show-student', templateUrl: './show-student.component.html', styleUrls: ['./show-student.component.css'] }) export class ShowStudentComponent { studentlist:Student[]=[ { "id": 1, "name": "Jack", "email": "jack@gmail.com", "gender": "male" }, { "id": 2, "name": "Peter", "email": "peter@gmail.com", "gender": "male" }, { "id": 3, "name": "Mary", "email": "mary@gmail.com", "gender": "female" }, { "id": 4, "name": "Smith", "email": "smith@gmail.com", "gender": "male" }, { "id": 5, "name": "John", "email": "john@gmail.com", "gender": "male" } ] id = 0; constructor(private activaterouter:ActivatedRoute){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.id=this.activaterouter.snapshot.params['id'];} }
